subject: Re: Fwd: Website update
preview: Hi Rula, We have updated the Group Bookings Payment page:https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings-payment/ - I made it the same link for simplicity. I have checked the maths, but please double-ch

full_threads.body:
Hi Rula, 

We have updated the Group Bookings Payment page:
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings-payment/ - I made it the same link for simplicity. 

I have checked the maths, but please double-check the adult pricing, children pricing and cakage. 

Speak soon :)

Hi Billy, 

Sorry about that. I've removed the unnecessary text on the menus and corrected the price. Please clear the cache of your browser just to make sure that you will see the latest version. 

Let me know if you would like further changes.

@rica all good, I just cleared the cached
already in $60 for both menus --screenshot
@jaime could you please help me with this? I already made the changes, check if I'm missing something.

Hi Rica, Just a few things need to be changed. I should have been more clear in my email. It seems as if the email I sent was simply copied and pasted. I wrote what I wrote to break down what I would have liked on the set menu page. Some of what was written should not have been uploaded onto the site. Quiet frankly it is a little embarrassing to have that up and live for all our guests who would be navigated to book or see our set menu packages online. You have currently uploaded the following.
  • This will need to be one of those drop tabs to allow them to choose the 4 pastas.
  • which I believe we already have there for reference.
  • Menu pricing when opened also has old pricing. $55 and $65.
The above was for your eyes only to help explain what needed to be done. Again not to be copied and pasted. Also the below link we send to for payment has not been updated in regards to the pricing, and drop tabs for them to choose which pizza and pastas they would like for the event. Group Bookings Payment - The Paper Mill Food Kind regards BILLY ZALOUMIS THE PAPER MILL FOOD 20 SHEPHERD STREET LIVERPOOL NSW 2170 T. +61 2 8742 4033 W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM E. VASILI@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM The Paper Mill Food notice and disclaimer: the information contained in this email (including attachments) is confidential and privileged. Hi Billy, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia changed the customer to Billy @ the Paper Mill Food
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
‌
You will find a link to these on this page https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/

They are the the gold buttons on the left side.

Please change the $55 MENU to Charcoal Joes Set Menu $60
Please change the $65 MENU to Georgies Set Menu $60

Thanks!

Heath Maguire
Creative Director
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au


ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: "Billy @ The Paper Mill Food" <billy@thepapermillfood.com>
Subject: Website update
Date: 28 April 2022 at 4:44:14 pm AEST
To: "heath@wolfiq.com.au" <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: "Rula Aridah @ The Paper Mill Food" <Rula@thepapermillfood.com>

Hi Heath,

I hope you are well!

We would like to change our set menus on our groups tabs.

Charcoal Joes Set Menu $60 minimum 8ppl

Starters
  • Platter including olives, dips, pickles and bread

  • Meat Sambousek

  • Cheese Sambousek

  • Meat Kibbi

  • Vine Leaves

  • Falafel

Mains
  • Woodfire Chicken

  • Beef Skewers

  • Joe's Chips

  • Fried Cauliflower with tahini dressing

  • Fatoush including pomegranate molasses and crispy bread

Dessert

  • Knafeh

Georgies Set Menu $60 minimum 8ppl

Starters

  • Antipasto platters

  • Mozzarella sticks

  • Arancini balls - spinach, mushroom and cheese

Mains

  • Your choice of 4 pastas ( spaghetti Bolognese, penne pesto, linguine con le vongole, spaghetti carbonara, penne alla norma, gnocchi sorrentina, gnocchi alla gorgonzola.) This will need to be one of those drop tabs to allow them to choose the 4 pastas.

  • Your choice of two pizzas which I believe we already have there for reference.

  • Garden salads

Dessert

  • Tiramisu

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask.

Thank you!

Kind regards

BILLY ZALOUMIS




THE PAPER MILL FOOD
20 SHEPHERD STREET
LIVERPOOL NSW 2170

T. +61 2 8742 4033

W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM

E. BILLY@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM
